name: Lion Manhole
description:
This game was made in a small group in a game gam week with the theme being to recreate a Nintendo game and watch title, the game that we decided to choose was ManHole and we decided to merge this with Lion.

The Team - 

  • Oliver Smith - Producer  / Coder
  • Alexandru Afoarei-Ionut - Coder
  • Jami Dorozala  - Background Art
  • Kristiyan  Tsvetanov - Platform Art
  • Amina Alnuaimi - Character Art/Animations
  • John Skelly - Sound
  • Seyed Mohammad Arshia Marashi - Sound
  • Leonardo Funari - Design
  • Anthony Abdulahad - UI Art
